text: Va az [mijoni] mardum kase hast, ki Allohro ʙo tardid meparastad [va imonaş zaif ast], pas, agar xajre ʙa ū ʙirasad, [dilaş] ʙa on orom megirad [va ʙar imonaş ʙoqī memonad] va agar ʙaloe [ʙaroi ozmoiş] ʙa ū ʙirasad, rū megardonad [va ʙa kufr ʙozmegardad]. Ū dar dunjo va oxirat zijon kardaast. In hamon zijoni oşkor ast
